import "./App.css"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { get, getAll, search, update } from "./BooksAPI"; import "./components/Books/book.css"; import Book from "./components/Books/Book"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState(""); const [searchResult, setSearchResult] = useState([]); const [shelf, setShelf] = useState(""); const [bookResult, setBookResult] = useState([]); const [updateBook, setupdateBook] = useState(""); const handleChange = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setSearchValue(event.target.value); let result = await search(event.target.value); setSearchResult(result); }; const selectShelf = async (event) => { setShelf(event.target.value); console.log(event.target.value); }; const allBooks = async () => { const result = await getAll(); setBookResult(result); }; useEffect(() => { allBooks(); }, []); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    {searchResult.map((result, id) => { return (
  1. {result.title}
    {result.authors.map((author) => author)}
    2. ); })}
) : (

MyReads

Want to Read

;
    {bookResult.map((book) => { return (
    2. ); })}

Currently Reading

;
  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card

Read

;
  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
)}
); } export default App;
